# damping

**Instance Property**

Defines how the spring’s motion should be damped due to the forces of friction.

## Declaration

```swift
var damping: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/damping] property is `10`. Reducing this value reduces the energy loss with each oscillation: the animated value will overshoot the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CABasicAnimation/toValue] and the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/settlingDuration] may be greater than the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAMediaTiming/duration]. Increasing the value increases the energy loss with each duration: there will be fewer and smaller oscillations and the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CASpringAnimation/settlingDuration] may be smaller than the duration.

## Configuring Physical Attributes

- **initialVelocity**: The initial velocity of the object attached to the spring.
- **mass**: The mass of the object attached to the end of the spring.
- **settlingDuration**: The estimated duration required for the spring system to be considered at rest.
- **stiffness**: The spring stiffness coefficient.
